item.description:
For More Info Click Here

Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

August 21, 2008- Monthly Meeting
Networking Extravaganza

Celebrate our one year anniversary with us!

Win Prizes - Enjoy refreshments - network to your hearts content - Share Deals and BUILD YOUR TEAM!
We get over 100 attendees everytime we do a networking event and we are offering up free seminars to anyone of our members who brings a guest and they sign up! I'm super excited! See you there!

5:30 PM - Networking
6:30 PM - Meeting

Location: Hilton Garden Inn, 420 Totten Pond Rd, Waltham, Ma
Free to Boston AREIA members (please see website for details - http://www.BostonAREI..., Visitors only $25 at the door.

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association August Meetup
